item.title: Thai and Cambodian Troops Fire at Each Other as Relations Implode
item.description: Soldiers traded fire over a disputed border after weeks of diplomatic tension between the Southeast Asian nations.

item.title: Why One of the Causes of Falling Birthrates May Be Prosperity
item.description: Economic growth has the unintended side effects of making parenthood more difficult and expensive.
